definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
example/mirror/to view/reflection/to reflect/to inspect/to warn/(ancient bronze mirror)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Now they can get a paternity test over the counter.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们现在他们可以直接去专柜做亲子鉴定。

sentences.english: At the same time, paternity test report came out, yo is small.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，亲子鉴定报告出来了，余淼就是小顺。

sentences.english: Yin Tse is anxious for the result of his grandon's paternity test.
sentences.chinese: 谢贤很焦急的等待亲子鉴定的结果。

sentences.english: She may have had a prenatal paternity test done.
sentences.chinese: 也许她做过产前亲子鉴定。

sentences.english: I speak to him the day after the result of his paternity test has come back.
sentences.chinese: 在他亲子鉴定结果出来的第二天我找过他。

sentences.english: To affirm the reliability of the criterion for judging paternity set by our laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 进一步确认我室确定的亲子鉴定判定标准的可靠性。

definition: to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested

pinyin: hun1 qian2 cai2 chan3 gong1 zheng4

definition: to check for compatibility (for an organ transplant)
abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
chemical examination/to do a lab test
to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)
